This notebook is being made to start a chlorophyll QC process for new incoming samples. Comparisons will be made for the entire timeseries to look for unusual concentrations.

```{r}
#Upload packages
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

```{r}
#Upload chl dataset - entire dataset downloaded from the portal on 2022-01-04
chl <- read_csv(here("files", "chl_2022-01-04.csv"))

#Upload Fluorometer dataset - only qu39 here?

```


```{r}
#Selecting relevant columns
chl <- chl %>% 
  select(date, site_id, line_out_depth, collected, analyzed, hakai_id, 
         calibration, filter_type, before_acid, after_acid, chla, chla_flag, 
         phaeo) 

#Adding month column
chl <- chl %>% 
  mutate(month = lubridate::month(date)) %>% 
  relocate(month, .after = date)

#Checking for duplicates
chl <- chl %>% 
  group_by(collected, site_id, line_out_depth, filter_type) %>% 
  mutate(rep = n()) %>%
  ungroup() %>% 
  mutate(acid_ratio = before_acid/after_acid)

#514 replicated records through the dataset
dup <- chl %>% 
  filter(rep > 1)

dup_qu39 <- chl %>% 
  filter(site_id == "QU39" & rep > 1)

```

```{r}
#Looking at QU39 and making a time-series plot of bulk chl concentrations separated by depth and colored by flag

chl %>%
  filter(site_id == "QU39" & line_out_depth < 50 &
           filter_type == "Bulk GF/F") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = chla)) + 
  geom_point(aes(fill = chla_flag), pch = 21, size = 3) + 
  geom_line() + 
  facet_grid(line_out_depth ~ ., scales = "free_y") +
  theme_bw() +
  theme(text = element_text(size = 25),
        axis.text = element_text(colour = "black"))

ggsave(here("figures", "QC__bulk_qu39_depth_TS.png"), 
       width = 16, height = 12, dpi=300)
```

```{r}
# I could make a box and whisker plot to of monthly data to show if any points fall outside of the expected range
chl %>%
  filter(site_id == "QU39" & line_out_depth < 50 &
           filter_type == "Bulk GF/F") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = as.factor(month), y = log10(chla + 1))) + 
  geom_boxplot() +
  # geom_dotplot(aes(fill = chla_flag), color = "black", trim = FALSE, binaxis = 'y', 
  #              stackdir ='center', dotsize = 2) +
  geom_jitter(aes(fill = chla_flag), pch = 21, size = 3, color = "black", 
              alpha = 0.8, 
              position=position_jitter(0.2)) +
  facet_grid(line_out_depth ~ ., scales = "free_y") +
  theme_bw() 

ggsave(here("figures", "QC_bulk_qu39_depth_box.png"), 
       width = 16, height = 12, dpi=300)
```
